channel.title: Authors on Pietro Lesci
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Pietro Lesci

item.description: I am a Research Assistant in NLP at the Bocconi Institute for Data Science and Analytics (BIDSA) in the Data and Marketing Insights (DMI) research unit, and a former trainee at the ECB in the Directorate of General Statistics. I am interested in NLP, Bayesian deep learning, Bayesian nonparametric statistics, complexity science, and their application to the study of the socio-economic environment and all its heterogeneous interacting parts. I am a passionate musician and a machine learning enthusiast.
